class=\"ubermenu-target-title ubermenu-target-text\">Why Clients Love Blueleaf</span></a></li></ul></nav>\n<!-- End UberMenu -->\n\t</div>\n</div>\n<div id=\"newfp_feat_one\" class=\"newfp_feat clearfix\">\n\t<div class=\"newfp_feat_plate\">\n<div class=\"box\">\n<h3><span>More</span> clients, <span>More</span> appreciation,<br><span>Less</span> work</h3>\n<h4>We’ve turned reporting into a Growth Engine leveraging a unique mix of Behavioral Design, Automation and Analytics.</h4>\n<a class=\"newfp_btn\" href=\"https://www.blueleaf.com/advisor/features/\">Learn More</a>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div id=\"newfp_sec_one\" class=\"newfp_sec clearfix\">\n\t<div class=\"box\">\n<h1>Reporting Communications Platform</h1>\n<h4>Delivering the right information to the right client at the right time via the right channel.</h4>\n<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_display.png\">\n</div>\n</div>\n<div id=\"newfp_sec_two\" class=\"newfp_sec clearfix\">\n\t<div class=\"box\">\n<h1>Growth Tools For Financial Advisors</h1>\n<h4>Do more for your clients, with our simple integrated components<br>and workflows to help you grow financial advisory relationships.</h4>\n<div class=\"newfp_sections clearfix\">\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_eight.png\" alt=\"Performance Reporting\">\n\t<h5>Performance Reporting</h5>\n\t<p>Reports that build relationships. Traditional reporting doesn’t do it. But our dashboards do.</p>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_three.png\" alt=\"Billing\">\n\t<h5>Billing <span>(new)</span></h5>\n\t<p>Customize your fees, communicate to your clients and get paid quickly with less work.</p>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_one.png\" alt=\"Prospecting Tools\">\n\t<h5>Prospecting Tools <span>(new)</span></h5>\n\t<p>Close like a boss. Build trust and win clients faster by easing prospects through your funnel.</p>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_six.png\" alt=\"Client Portal\">\n\t<h5>Client Portal</h5>\n\t<p>Open 24 hour/day. World class advice now includes world class access and transparency</p>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_seven.png\" alt=\"Account Aggregation\">\n\t<h5>Account Aggregation</h5>\n\t<p>See it, service it, grow. With access to over 21,000+ institutions you’ll see it all.</p>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_five.png\" alt=\"Tracking and Alerting\">\n\t<h5>Tracking &amp; Alerting</h5>\n\t<p>Know before they do. Track assets anywhere automatically so you know BEFORE your clients.</p>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_four.png\" alt=\"Client Communication\">\n\t<h5>Client Communication</h5>\n\t<p>Show clients your value. Automated communications that build client confidence.</p>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_two.png\" alt=\"Document Sharing\">\n\t<h5>Document Sharing</h5>\n\t<p>Our vault allows two-way sharing right in our portal with UNLIMITED FREE storage</p>\n</div>\n\n<div class=\"newfp_sec_col\">\n\t<img src=\"/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_icon_nine.png\" alt=\"Alternative Investments\">\n\t<h5>Alternative Investments</h5>\n\t<p>Track alternative &amp; private investment performance alongside other client assets.</p>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div id=\"newfp_sec_four\" class=\"newfp_sec clearfix\">\n\t<div class=\"box\">\n<h1>We already work with everyone you do</h1>\n<h4>Just some of the fantastic custodians we work with</h4>\n<img src=\"https://www.blueleaf.com/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_clients_one.png\"><img src=\"https://www.blueleaf.com/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_clients_two.png\"><img src=\"https://www.blueleaf.com/wp-content/thesis/skins/blueleaf/images/blueleaf_clients_three.png\">\n</div>\n<div id=\"newfp_feat_two\" class=\"newfp_feat clearfix\">\n\t<div class=\"newfp_feat_plate\">\n<div class=\"box\">\n<h3>Growing advisors <span>#1 Growth Platform</span></h3>\n<p>All the tools you need to grow your advisory<br>business in one place.</p>\n<a class=\"newfp_btn\" href=\"https://get.blueleaf.com/free-trial/\">Start Your Free Trial</a><a class=\"newfp_btn newfp_white\" href=\"https://www.blueleaf.com/advisor/features/\">Learn More</a>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<footer id=\"footer\" class=\"clearfix\">\n\t<div class=\"box\">\n\t\t<div class=\"foot_col\">\n<div class=\"widget widget_text foot_widget\" id=\"text-3\"><h4 class=\"widget_title\">About</h4>\t\t\t<div class=\"textwidget\"><ul>\n<li><a href=\"/the-blueleaf-story\">Our Story</a></li>\n<li><a href=\"/about-blueleaf\">The Team</a>\n</li><li><a href=\"/board-and-advisors\">The Board</a></li>\n<li><a href=\"/partners\">Partners </a></li>\n</ul></div>\n\t\t</div>\t\t</div>\n\t\t<div class=\"foot_col\">\n<div class=\"widget widget_text
